Dialect of markdown. Does not work for JS with Nim version 1.2.x and earlier.

Imports

singlexml

Types

MarggersElement = ref object
  case isText*: bool
  of true:
      str*: mstring

  else:
      tag*: mstring
      attrs*: seq[(mstring, mstring)]
      content*: seq[MarggersElement]

Procs

proc `$`(elem: MarggersElement): string {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Outputs a marggers element as HTML. 
proc toCstring(elem: MarggersElement): cstring {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Outputs a marggers element as HTML as a cstring, but only in JS. 
proc parseMarggers(text: mstring): seq[MarggersElement] {...}{.
    raises: [Defect, IOError, OSError, ValueError, Exception],
    tags: [ReadIOEffect, RootEffect].}
Parses a string (cstring for JS) of text in marggers and translates it to HTML line by line. Result is a sequence of MarggersElements, to simply generate HTML with no need for readability turn these all into strings with $ and join them with "".
